EmailTemplate.name: Deviated Cost 60 Day Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Deviated Cost 60 Day Expiration Notification: {!Deviated_Cost__c.Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Deviated_Cost__c.Account_Owner_Name__c},
The Deviated Cost Agreement for '{!Deviated_Cost__c.Account_Name__c}' ends in 60 days on {!Deviated_Cost__c.End_Date__c}. It is imperative that you contact the Vendor ({!Deviated_Cost__c.Vendor__c}) to ensure timely renewal to prevent rebate delays.
If the Deviated Cost Agreement is not renewed, then core pricing must be updated to reflect loss of deviation! Please note: this will affect your compensation.
When applicable, please follow the link below to update the 'Rep Disposition' field on the Deviated Cost page (disposition options are: Deviated Cost Review, Extension Granted, and No Extension - Deal Ended).
Sincerely, Deviated Cost Team
Link to Deviated Cost in SFDC: {!Deviated_Cost__c.Link}
